content:
Match Schedule:

1. Afghanistan vs South Africa on 2026-02-11 at Narendra Modi Stadium
2. Australia vs Ireland on 2026-02-11 at R.Premadasa Stadium
3. England vs West Indies on 2026-02-11 at Wankhede Stadium
4. Sri Lanka vs Oman on 2026-02-12 at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium
5. Italy vs Nepal on 2026-02-12 at Wankhede Stadium
6. India vs Namibia on 2026-02-12 at Arun Jaitley Stadium
7. Australia vs Zimbabwe on 2026-02-13 at R.Premadasa Stadium
8. Canada vs United Arab Emirates on 2026-02-13 at Arun Jaitley Stadium
9. Netherlands vs United States of America on 2026-02-13 at MA Chidambaram Stadium
10. South Africa W vs Pakistan W on 2026-02-13 at Willowmoore Park
15 feb 2026 ko kon kon se match hai??

१५ फरवरी २०२६ को होने वाले मैच:

1. नेपाल बनाम वेस्टइंडीज, वानखेड़े स्टेडियम में
2. ऑस्ट्रेलिया महिला बनाम भारत महिला, सिडनी क्रिकेट ग्राउंड में
3. नामीबिया बनाम संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका, एमए चिदंबरम स्टेडियम में
